result.title: RTX, Lockheed Martin, And Northrop Grumman: Q3 Results Show Defense Still Has Industrial Power
result.text: The US defense industry has become the visible engine of reindustrialization  a sector where manufacturing, innovation, and employment merge to sustain America's technological and economic leadership. Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman, and RTX represent three complementary pillars: efficiency, technological balance, and renewed growth  distinct strategies within the same industrial cycle. Q3 2025 confirmed strong demand, expanding margins, and solid cash generation, proving these companies deliver real operating power, not financial engineering or narrative-driven growth.
